text: You mean, C but with Julian syntax?

elements.text: You mean, C but with Julian syntax?

text: rather a compiler mode for Julia that only allows you to use a special subset which is basically just C.  To be fair, technically you can do most of that in Julia already because of all the stuff available for calling C, but there is no subset which is specially designed to be used without garbage collection
